duration_in_months: How long will it take to fulfill this contract?
full_summary:
## AOPS Towing Gear
#### Dispositif de remorquage

*Reference Number:  cb-515-80242483*
*AMENDMENT NUMBER 5*
*Solicitation Number: W847S-240146/B*
*Publication Date:  2023-12-28*
*Tender Closing Date:  2024-01-12T15:00:00*
*Amendment Date: 2024-01-12*
*Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-02-13*
*Expected Contract End Date: 2024-12-31*
*Tender Status: Expired*

**About the Contract**
The government is seeking the highest quality towing gear for the Arctic- and Offshore Patrol Ships (AOPS). The contract will be for a period of one year, commencing on February 13, 2024, and ending on December 31, 2024.

**Requirements**
The following Unspsc codes have been allocated for this contract:
* 22101700: Heavy equipment components
* 25111900: Marine craft systems and subassemblies

The contract will be awarded through competitive open bidding. The provision selection criteria shall be the lowest price.

**Legal Requirements**
The contract is subject to the following trade agreements:
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

This contract is also subject to regions of opportunity and delivery in Canada.

**Closing Information**
Closing date for this contract is 2024-01-12T15:00:00. The contractor will be awarded through the lowest priced bid.

**Contracting Entity Information**

The contracting entity is DGMPD(Sea), and the address is:
AOPS Detachment - HMCS Sackville Bldg.
Halifax, Nova Scotia
B3K 5M7, Canada

(Contact for more information: Stephen Vogler, Stephen.Vogler@forces.gc.ca, 902-456-6702)

**Attachments**
The files attached to this tender notice can be found at the included URLs: 
[AOPS-RFP-Towing-GEar-Dec.-07-Eng Final.pdf](src://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28480/aops-rfp---towing-gear---dec.-07-eng_0.pdf)
[AOPS-RFP-Towing-GEar-Dec.-07-Fr Final.pdf](src://canadabuys.canada.ca
